description: The network work quota is configurable https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/conf/api.py#L307 But we forget enable network quota in the quota's update json-schema. This leads to user can't update network qutoa.
title: The schema of quota's update isn't include networks quota

comments.content: The network work quota is configurable https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/conf/api.py#L307 But we forget enable network quota in the quota's update json-schema.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/347588
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/347588
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=767b3db4116e7fba8275c67c2a4d7caad0bf647b
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 767b3db4116e7fba8275c67c2a4d7caad0bf647b
Author: He Jie Xu <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 27 09:54:34 2016 +0800

    Add networks to quota's update json-schema when network quota enabled
    
    The enable of network quota is configurable. But the json-schema of quota
    update won't be updated accroding configuration. This leads to user can't
    update network quota from API.
    
    This patch add network quota when it's enabled.
    
    Change-Id: I922525bfe55c42d2bf187c3bcd30536c8adf1c4f
    Closes-Bug: #1606740
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/mitaka

Author: He Jie Xu <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 27 09:54:34 2016 +0800

    Add networks to quota's update json-schema when network quota enabled
    
    The enable of network quota is configurable. But the json-schema of quota
    update won't be updated accroding configuration. This leads to user can't
    update network quota from API.
    
    This patch add network quota when it's enabled.
    
    Change-Id: I922525bfe55c42d2bf187c3bcd30536c8adf1c4f
